## Notice for developers

You may need to manually update the minimum version of `uv` required to ensure that it can install this new Python version. Update `[tool.uv]`'s `required-version` line.

## Notice for developers

Python's `govuk-frontend-jinja` package and the JavaScript package `govuk-frontend` need to be bumped together and kept aligned according to this [Compatability table](https://github.com/LandRegistry/govuk-frontend-jinja?tab=readme-ov-file#compatibility). You must manually work out what versions we should upgrade to, and should not rely on Renovate to get it correct (this PR exists as a reminder to keep these dependencies up-to-date, but unlike other PRs, manual work is required.

### Design/product review may be required

Minor and major version bumps of GOV.UK Frontend should only be accepted in collaboration with design and a detailed review of how changes will affect the service.
